title: [House Brigatta, Entry]
description: The entry to House Brigatta is panelled and floored in dark oak.  An ornately carved table sits to one side with a small crystal vase standing upon it beneath a brightly polished silver mirror.  On the west wall, a series of shelves and pegs hold various cloaks and garb for the outer world.  To the east, a stairway heads up to the second floor.

The entry to House Brigatta is panelled and floored in dark oak.  An ornately carved table sits to one side with a small crystal vase standing upon it beneath a brightly polished silver mirror.  Across the room, a series of shelves and pegs holds various cold weather cloaks and garb for the outer world as well as bits and pieces of battle stained armor.

The entry to House Brigatta is panelled and floored in dark oak.  An ornately carved table sits to one side with a small crystal vase standing upon it beneath a brightly polished silver mirror.  On the west wall, a series of shelves and pegs hold various cloaks and garb for the outer world.  To the east, a stairway lit with flickering sconces heads up to the second floor.
